title: "Travel is still big in startup budgets, AI tools still experimental"
excerpt: "Despite the current boom in artificial intelligence tools enabling businesses to infuse some of the technology, startups aren't spending huge amounts on it yet. Why it matters: A number of companies, big and small, have rushed to deploy tools like OpenAI's ChatGPT into their own products, but so far the use of AI remains experimental for startups."
